did.unittitle: E. H. Fair Collection on "Emerson's Course of Study", 1913-1917
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection consists of a bound vol. of Harrington Emerson's 'A Home Course in Personal Efficiency' and a folder containing an exam taken by a student who completed part one of the course and booklet of instructions on taking the course.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a bound vol. of Harrington Emerson's 'A Home Course in Personal Efficiency' and a folder containing an exam taken by a student who completed part one of the course and booklet of instructions on taking the course.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: E. H. Fair Collection on "Emerson's Course of Study" #6258. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: General Instructions to Students and Lesson One Exam

scopecontent.p: Correspondence course in the Science of Personal Efficiency
